note.p: Birth: Utica, New York, USA (12 February 1813)
Death: New Haven, Connecticut, USA (14 April 1895)

Career: Instructor in Mathematics to midshipmen, US Navy; Assistant to Professor Silliman; published 'Descriptive mineralogy' (1837); Mineralogist and Geologist, United States expedition voyage around the world; Professor of Geology and Natural History, Yale (1850); retired (1892); died of heart failure
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1895 vol 58 pp lvii-lx signed by L F
